preqs: Students must have passed one of the following units MKX5461, MKX9160, MKX9550 OR MBA9006 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MBA5906, MBA9006, MKF5461, MKF5916, MKX5461, MKX5955, MKX9160, MKX9550} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 11, 42, 50}

description: Evaluation of a marketing program is a critical ingredient of the marketing director's role. This unit examines various means of diagnosing, assessing, tracking and evaluating performance and modifying actions to improve marketing operations.
